external_references.description: Budaca, E., et al. (2021, August 25). FIN8 Threat Actor Goes Agile with New Sardonic Backdoor. Retrieved August 9, 2023.

description: [FIN8](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0061) has used an expired open-source X.509 certificate for testing in the OpenSSL repository, to connect to actor-controlled C2 servers.(Citation: Bitdefender Sardonic Aug 2021)
